name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud
description: Deploy your HTML vibe instantly to a free IBM Cloud Object Storage bucket.

variables.name: region
variables.description: IBM Cloud region to deploy your vibe bucket.

variables.name: resource_group_name
variables.description: IBM Cloud resource group name (use 'Default' if on a trial).

variables.name: cos_plan
variables.description: Cloud Object Storage plan (Lite is free).

variables.name: vibe_instance_name
variables.description: Prefix for your Object Storage instance name.

variables.name: vibe_bucket_name
variables.description: Prefix for your vibe bucket name.

variables.name: vibe_html_input_base64
variables.description: Your HTML, Base64 encoded. Use an online tool to encode your file first.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_url
outputs.description: Public URL for your IBM Cloud Object Storage bucket.

outputs.name: vibe_url
outputs.description: Public link to your deployed HTML app.
